Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:Superstition (C2C Remix)]
[ar:C2C Stevie Wonder]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:17.70]Very superstitious, writings on the wall,
[00:26.06]Very superstitious, ladders bout' to fall,
[00:34.76]Thirteen month old baby, broke the lookin' glass,
[00:43.11]Seven years of bad luck, the good things in your past.
[00:49.68]
[00:52.41]When you believe in things that you don't understand,
[00:56.75]Then you suffer,
[00:59.54]Superstition ain't the way.
[01:01.77]
[02:19.42]Very superstitious, wash your face and hands,
[02:27.71]Rid me of the problem, do all that you can,
[02:36.10]Keep me in a daydream, keep me goin' strong,
[02:45.63]You don't want to save me, sad is my song.
[02:51.44]
[02:54.78]When you believe in things that you don't understand,
[02:58.72]Then you suffer,
[03:02.06]Superstition ain't the way, yeh, yeh.
[03:07.93]
